item.title: Change a line in all of your files at once
item.description: Sometimes you need to change a single line in a lot of files. May be you made a mistake in your configuration files or you want to change the number of initial conditions to be generated automatically. With sed it is super-easy: sed -i 's/"Runs": 10,/"Runs": 50,/g' *.txt
